top.title: Four years into its full-scale war in Ukraine, Russia is feeling the effects
top.summary: Steve Rosenberg reports on the economic consequences of Russia's war, and how people are coping.

top.title: Zelensky tells BBC Putin has started WW3 and must be stopped
top.summary: Ukraine's president sat down with the BBC's Jeremy Bowen in Kyiv days before the four-year anniversary of the war.

top.title: Cartel henchmen unleash violence after top drug lord killed in Mexico
top.summary: The death of the most-wanted Jalisco cartel chief sparks retaliatory violence in at least a dozen states in Mexico.

top.title: 'The end of Xbox': fans split as AI exec takes over Microsoft's top gaming role
top.summary: The executive shake-up has sparked online debate about new boss Asha Sharma's gaming credentials.

top.title: Porn company fined £1.35m by Ofcom over age check failings
top.summary: Ofcom's £1.35m fine on 8579 LLC is the largest it has levied under the Online Safety Act so far.

top.title: Is £70 becoming harder to justify? The rise of cheaper blockbuster games
top.summary: As top games such as GTA 6 are speculated to cost $100 (£74), some developers are deliberately pricing lower.

The creators of Dark Sky have a new weather app that shares multiple predictions
Discord distances itself from Persona age verification after user backlash
